name: Body & Linen Spray
description: Elevate your space and senses with our versatile 4 oz mist, infused with Quartz Crystals for clarity and charm. Perfect for refreshing your body, linens, car, furniture, and even pet beds, it features a fine mist spray cap and a delightful blend of distilled water, alcohol-free witch hazel, a vegetable-based preservative, and essential and fragrance oils. Choose from fierce floral "BITCH BE GONE," zesty "SAY GOODBYE TO YOUR OVERGROWN MAN CHILD," sweet and sassy "DON’T MAKE ME GO ALL JERSEY GIRL ON YOU!," or calming "I DON’T RECALL ASKING FOR YOUR OPINION!" Stay fresh, fierce, and fabulous with every spritz.
